properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 2 at 8:07PM CST until March 2 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northern Fulton County in north central Arkansas...

* Until 900 PM CST.

* At 806 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of
Viola, or 9 miles northwest of Salem in Fulton County, moving east
at 35 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage
to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Salem in Fulton County...         Mammoth Spring...
Viola...                          Sturkie...
Mammoth Spring State Park...      Flint Springs...
Moko...                           Fryatt...
Saddler Falls...                  Camp...
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for north central
Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
